overview: Carla, a girl from the neighborhood of Las Palmas, in the capital of the Córdoba province, who, along with his stepbrother and some friends ( fervent fans of the neighborhood's soccer club), steal the good-luck hen of the opposing team: Alberdi sporting Club. This way, from neighborhood to neighborhood, concrete elements (money, balls, drums, motorbikes, the hen itself) are passed from hand to hand and different relations will tie their luck to them.
title: Sporting Club
